casebody.data:
Thomas KRASNOLUTSKY, by His Guardian ad Litem Jacob Krasnolutsky, and Jacob Krasnolutsky, Individually, Plaintiffs-Appellanis, v. The NEW YORK CENTRAL RAILROAD COMPANY, a Corporation, Defendant-Appellee. Peter ZUBE, an Infant, by His Guardian ad Litem Helen Zube, and Helen Zube, Individually, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. The NEW YORK CENTRAL RAILROAD COMPANY, a Corporation, Defendant-Appellee. Nos. 146, 147. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 4, 1937. Rowland H. Long, of New York City, for appellants. Clive C. Handy, of New York City (Kenneth O. Mott-Smith, of New York City, of counsel), for respondents.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgments affirmed.
